Even Trump's first pick in the state who was forced to bow out, alleged domestic abuser Sean Parnell, said the endorsement was "the antithesis of everything that made Trump the best president of my lifetime.”
Now Trumpworld is rushing to contain the fallout among his base, according to Politico.

Dr. Mehmet Oz
The last time we checked in on Donald Trump's endorsement of celebrity healther Dr. Mehmet Oz for Pennsylvania's open Senate seat, right-wingers from Roger Stone to former OANN anchors were blasting the move.

But if one thing has come to light through Trump's pretty horrendous string of 2022 endorsements, it's that Trump toadies like Hannity haven't exactly given him the soundest advice.
